Definition: You are given an Amazon food product review and its summary. If the review and summary match, output "True". Otherwise, output "False".

Positive Examples.input:
I have bought several of the Vitality canned dog food products and have found them all to be of good quality. The product looks more like a stew than a processed meat and it smells better. My Labrador is finicky and she appreciates this product better than  most. 
 Summary: Good Quality Dog Food
Positive Examples.explanation: The customer talked about dog food which was good. So, it's a correct Summary. So, the correct answer is true.

Positive Examples.input:
Product arrived labeled as Jumbo Salted Peanuts...the peanuts were actually small sized unsalted. Not sure if this was an error or if the vendor intended to represent the product as "Jumbo". 
 Summary: Not as Advertised
Positive Examples.explanation: The customer didn't get the product they show in the advertisement. So, it's a correct Summary. So, the correct answer is True.

Positive Examples.input:
Great taffy at a great price.  There was a wide assortment of yummy taffy.  Delivery was very quick.  If your a taffy lover, this is a deal. 
 Summary: Good Oatmeal
Positive Examples.explanation: The customer is neutral with the product and he has some complaint. So the summary is incorrect.

Negative Examples.input:
My daughter loves twizzlers and this shipment of six pounds really hit the spot. It's exactly what you would expect...six packages of strawberry twizzlers. 
 Summary: Lots of twizzlers, just what you expect.
Negative Examples.explanation: It's only supposed to say if the Polarity of given review is "True" or "False"

Negative Examples.input:
I ordered this product for a themed baby shower. They went over well and they tasted just like normal cracker jacks. Loved that I could find the box and they fit perfect in favor bags. 
 Summary: It's a fine cracker
Negative Examples.explanation: It's a correct summary so the answer should be true.

Negative Examples.input:
My cats have been happily eating Felidae Platinum for more than two years. I just got a new bag and the shape of the food is different. They tried the new food when I first put it in their bowls and now the bowls sit full and the kitties will not touch the food. I've noticed similar reviews related to formula changes in the past. Unfortunately, I now need to find a new food that my cats will eat. 
 Summary: My cats loved the food.
Negative Examples.explanation: The customer's cat really didn't eat the food customer order so the summary is wrong. So, the correct answer should be false.

Instances.input:
It only lasted 2 days. Came mostly dead. Glad it was only 10 bucks. It was also very small so. The flies I wanted it to eat , it couldn't. 
 Summary: Small

This product works just as advertised!! Guitar center told me the only way to connect my mic to my computer was either an expensive converter box or a usb mic. A-HOLES haha. I love this little gizmo and would definitely recommend it to a friend!! 
 Summary: AWESOME! BUY FOR SURE!

Since I love both strawberries and kiwis, I thought this one would be perfect for me. Well, I was wrong. It basically tastes like bubbly fruit punch, not exactly strawberry kiwi. Looking at the ingredients list, it shouldn't surprise.... it's a mixture of fruits, kiwi and strawberry being on the bottom of the list.  I do recommend the cherry Switch drink, but that's the only one out of three that I liked. 
 Summary: Much too sweet

I got these for $10 for the 24 pack, so a pretty good deal. They are about as healthy as the baked chips I usually buy.  They all taste great and Im officially a fan.  It's pretty much what it sounds like chips that are popped instead of baked.  So they do have some "air" in them.  .8 ounce bags is slightly more than the .75 ounches in baked lays bags I was buying.  Good buy if you can get a good deal like I did 
 Summary: Def a good buy

I recieved a Keurig K-Cup Brewer for Christmas with sample cups of coffee and tea but no cocoa so I tried this brand and I like them but I haven't tried other brands yet to compare with. I would buy these again until I find one I like better. 
 Summary: k-cups

Absolutely NO cheese flavor at all. All you can taste is salt salt salt. Save your money and try something else. 
 Summary: way too salty

I have been searching for a natural lemonade drink mix that would actually taste good.  This is not one of them.  Did not like the the bitter taste of this drink mix. I can make my own fresh squeezed lemonade better than this stuff.  In the mean time I purchase Newmans Own ready made lemonade if I don't have the time to make my own lemonade. 
 Summary: No thanks

My dog loves the tug-a-jug. I've bought three of them and on all of them the bottom has split. The bottom edges and threads split and break off. My dog isn't particularly hard on the toy either, it's only used on the carpet and she doesn't swing it around into walls or furniture. She stands it up, knocks it over and drags it by the rope along the floor with her paws. I really want to recommend this product, but I can't afford to replace it every three to five uses. 
 Summary: Broken Tooth
